text: 21|5|ennal avar parannu: palkinavukal kanta vivaraman (muham'mad parayunnat‌) (marrearikkal avar parannu:) alla, atavan ketticcamaccuntakkiyatan‌. (marrearikkal avar parannu:) alla; avanearu kaviyan‌. ennal (avan pravacakananenkil) mun pravacakanmar etearu drstantavumayanea ayakkappettat atupealeann avan namukk keant vannu kanikkatte
